txt.en:
[placeholder],

You are well-known to us now, and I would like to extend an invitation to look upon Ann√∫minas and the ruins of our old kingdom. We are camped at the ruins of Tinnudir along the banks of Lake Evendim.

Visit us, if you desire.

Calenglad

'Welcome, friend.

'As you can see we are here with intentions to reclaim some of our heritage. Imagine our surprise to find the ruins crawling with minions of the Enemy.

'If it interests you, we could use your aid.'
A letter found its way to you from the leader of an expidition of Rangers in Evendim. The letter invited you to visit them at the ruins of Tinnudir.

Tinnudir lay on the eastern bank of Lake Evendim, a massive lake in the shadow of the Blue Mountains. Calenglad is surely stationed somewhere in the camp there.\n\nCalenglad sent a message inviting you to speak with him at Tinnudir.
